page.title: 15'POP' MUSIC
page.content: (Sarah, age 12): My favourite pop music is by {'WHAM' }who sing 'Club Tropicana' and 'Wake Me Up Before You Go Go' and others. I have all their records on tape. 'Wham' consists of the handsome George Michael and Andrew Ridgely. I hope to get a pillow and scarf with their faces on. My mam likes them too. I am going to buy her a scarf. My mam puts their records on full blast and so does my Uncle John. My three-year old brother jumps on the bed singing 'Wake Me Up Before You Go Go' I like Shaking Stevens as well .
